VarInt64ArrayTraits¶

class zserio.array.VarInt64ArrayTraits[source]¶

Bases: object

Array traits for Zserio varint64 type.

Attributes Summary

HAS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT

Methods Summary

bitSizeOf(_bitPosition, value) Returns length of Zserio varint64 type stored in the bit stream in bits.
initializeOffsets(bitPosition, value) Initializes indexed offsets for Zserio varint64 type.
read(reader, _index) Reads Zserio varint64 type from the bit stream.
write(writer, value) Writes Zserio varint64 type to the bit stream.

Attributes Documentation

HAS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = False¶

Methods Documentation

static bitSizeOf(_bitPosition, value)[source]¶

Returns length of Zserio varint64 type stored in the bit stream in bits.

Parameters:
  • _bitPosition – Not used.
  • value – Zserio varint64 type value.
Returns:

Length of given Zserio varint64 type in bits.
static initializeOffsets(bitPosition, value)[source]¶

Initializes indexed offsets for Zserio varint64 type.

Parameters:
  • bitPosition – Current bit stream position.
  • value – Zserio varint64 type value.
Returns:

Updated bit stream position which points to the first bit after Zserio varint64 type.
static read(reader, _index)[source]¶

Reads Zserio varint64 type from the bit stream.

Parameters:
  • reader – Bit stream from which to read.
  • _index – Not used.
static write(writer, value)[source]¶

Writes Zserio varint64 type to the bit stream.

Parameters:
  • writer – Bit stream where to write.
  • value – Zserio varint64 type to write.
